Company Overview

We are the force behind the meteoric rise of India's leading telecom operator Jio with 400 Million+ customers. In addition to this, we have also powered an exhaustive list of digital apps & services that have delivered functionality, usability, engagement, scale, and loyalty. Our solutions cater to both B2C and B2B customers, with an end-to-end 5G solution and cloud-native products. Jio has 51-200 employees and is headquartered in Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra.

Job Overview

IT Operations Engineer needed for Jio in Navi Mumbai, on a Contract basis. Ideal candidate should have 1-4 years of experience.

Qualifications And Skills

  • ISO 27001 knowledge
  • Familiarity with ISO standards
  • Understanding of Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC)
  • Experience in Security Operations

Roles And Responsibilities

  • Ensure compliance with ISO 27001 and other relevant standards
  • Manage IT governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) initiatives
  • Oversee security operations and implement security best practices
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams for effective IT operations
